sentence.idiomatic: I trust its quality.
Chinese production quality is improving.
These shoes are nice.
This is a nice choice.
Nice, I agree with you.
These shoes are worth 200 yuan at most.
The most I can eat at once is two hamburgers.
Today is 30 degrees at most.
The style of this skirt is really nice.
I like this style.
Style is an important part of mobile phones.
He is quite frank.
You are not being straight with me.
I like to deal with frank people.
He likes to toot his own horn.
Stop tooting your own horn, I don't believe you.
He's bragging. There's absolutely no way.
My Gosh, 500 for a skirt? You're trying to rob me in a broad daylight.

word.literal: one dollar buys one dollar\'s worth of product

sentence.idiomatic: You must know that you get what you pay for. This is an Italian brand. It is handmade and has a superior texture.
Don't try to fool me! The tailoring of this skirt is just average. The color is not that pretty either. It's not worth 500. Don't give me that ridiculous price.
What? This skirt is made from the best fabric. It's clear to the people who knows clothing. The quality of clothes from this brand are very good.
Stop tooting your own horn. The style of the skirt is nice. I would buy it if its a reasonable price. Just give me your lowest price.
If you really want it, I can give you 20% off. How about 400?
You are not being straight with me. It's still way too expensive. The most I can give is 200 or I am out of here.
Hang on! How about a bit more? 300? You can't drag the price below that!
